US Comptroller of the Currency 
@BrianBrooksOCC
 says banks must allow customers to store #Bitcoin & #Cryptocurrency

1314307629217390599.name: Stuart Alderoty
1314307629217390599.content: Agreed. All stakeholders - private industry, regulators, individual users, and legislators - need to work together to do all we can to keep bad actors out of crypto. Ripple has worked with the regulators, including DOJ, since the beginning. https://justice.gov/opa/pr/attorney-general-william-p-barr-announces-publication-cryptocurrency-enforcement-framework… (1/2)

1314297155629219840.content:
In 2017, my biggest mistake was not diversifying when I had the opportunity to...

I had 100% of my net-worth in crypto 

In 2020, I learned from my mistakes and have diversified my holdings. 

Now I only have 98% of my net-worth in crypto and the rest in Pokémon cards

1314279492618256387.name: Brad Garlinghouse
1314279492618256387.content: An 70+ page contradictory report is not regulatory clarity -- many responsible private players are trying to follow the rules, but that becomes increasingly hard when there’s no single arbiter of the law (5+ govt agencies with different PoVs on crypto). (1/2)
